titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of certain plastic flat goods.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 4/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty with respect to certain plastic flat goods with an outer surface area of not less than 20 percent leather.
